TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TOutput Converter<in TInput,out TOutput>(TInput input);
.class public auto ansi sealed Converter`2<- TInput, + TOutput> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function Converter(Of In TInput, Out TOutput)(input As TInput) As TOutput
generic <typename TInput, typename TOutput> public delegate TOutput Converter(TInput input);

span.span: The type of object that is to be converted.

typeparam.name: TOutput
typeparam.span: 輸入物件要轉換成的型別。

span.span: The type the input object is to be converted to.

summary.span: 表示將物件從某個型別轉換成另一個型別的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that converts an object from one type to another type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派由方法類別和方法將集合的每個項目轉換成另一種類型的類別。This delegate is used by the method of the class and the method of the class to convert each element of the collection from one type to another. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範具有委派方法類別，而第二個示範與委派方法泛型類別。The first demonstrates the delegate with the method of the class, and the second demonstrates the delegate with the method of the generic class. 範例 1Example 1 下列程式碼範例定義名為的方法`PointFToPoint`以將轉換成結構結構。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 這個範例會建立的陣列結構，則會建立`Converter`委派 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來代表`PointFToPoint`方法，並傳遞至委派方法。The example then creates an array of structures, creates a `Converter` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法會傳遞至輸入清單的每個項目`PointFToPoint`方法並將已轉換的項目放入新的清單結構。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 這兩份清單會顯示。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Array_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Array_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)] 範例 2Example 2 下列程式碼範例定義名為的方法`PointFToPoint`以將轉換成結構結構。The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a structure to a structure. 這個範例會建立的結構，則會建立`Converter\`委派 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` Visual Basic 中) 來代表`PointFToPoint`方法，並傳遞至委派方法。The example then creates a of structures, creates a `Converter\` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the method. 方法會傳遞至輸入清單的每個項目`PointFToPoint`方法並將已轉換的項目放入新的清單結構。The method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of structures. 這兩份清單會顯示。Both lists are displayed. [!code-cpp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[List\`1_ConvertAll#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/List`1_ConvertAll/vb/source.vb#1)]
